A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rey and Kylo's paralleling plots are the best part of the movie. Finn's story is a throwaway. Laura Dern's character creates unneeded drama for Poe by not revealing she had a plan for escaping and instead acts like a douche. Rose provides a random and shoehorned love interest for Finn. Yoda makes an awkward appearance and breaks the conventions of what the Force can do\, providing a major plothole in the entire series. Phasma enters just as quickly as she exits. Luke gives a recycled bit of dialogue from Obi-Wan to Kylo. Overall\, it has its flaws and is rushed kind of like this review\, but it is enjoyable.
